MAINFORM.EXENOTINROOT: Game executable is not in the root folder, select the root folder manually
MAINFORM.SETGAMENAME: Enter a name for the game
MAINFORM.GAMEEXISTS: A game with this name is already added
MAINFORM.MENU.RUN.TOOLTIP: Run a third-party .exe in the game prefix
MAINFORM.KILLFAILED: Failed to terminate the game process - it may still be starting
BANNEREDITOR.STEAM.HEADER: Get a new cover from Steam
BANNEREDITOR.FILE.HEADER: Set a new cover from file
GAMESETTINGS.WINETRICKS.NOPREFIX: Run the game at least once
GAMESETTINGS.NOGITHUBAPI: Error accessing GitHub API! Failed to get Proton versions. Disable VPN, Comss/Xbox DNS and try again
GAMESETTINGS.STEAM.NORUNTIME: Steam Runtime not found! Do you want to install it?
GAMESETTINGS.PROTONS.PREFIXMOVE: Move old prefix to new path?
GAMESETTINGS.GAMEMODE.WARNING: Some fixes stop working due to gamemode
GAMESETTINGS.STEAMOVERLAY.WARNING: Steam Overlay does not work in all games
LAUNCHERSETTINGS.PROTON.HINT: (you can also install your own Proton builds in the directory selected in the «Paths» tab)
LAUNCHERSETTINGS.LAUNCHER.SPLASH: Splash when launching game from shortcut
NEWGAMECONFIG.PREFIX.PATHNONEMPTY: Folder is not empty! When removing the game from the launcher, it may be deleted, keep this in mind
NEWGAMECONFIG.ARESURE: Are you sure? This will delete downloaded files
NEWGAMECONFIG.CLEANSKIPPED: Skipping removal of install files because the game is installed to the same path
NEWGAMECONFIG.NAME: Game name in launcher
ADDGAME.FILECHOOSER: Select the root folder of the game OR a folder with unextracted RAR archive(s)
ADDGAME.EMPTY: No RAR archives or executables found! Try another folder
ADDGAME.SOURCE.ADD: Add an already downloaded game or specify a source for downloading games
ADDGAME.SOURCE.FAIL: The link is not a valid OnlineFix source!
ADDGAME.SOURCE.HINT:
Failed to get the list of downloadable games.

Check your Internet connection
or change the source.
To retry, reopen this window.
ADDGAME.XBOXWARN: The list may contain Xbox-fix games. They will not work.
PROTONDOWNLOADER.NOTAR: tar not found! Unpacking is impossible
PROTONDOWNLOADER.NOPATH: The path for Protons is incorrect, change the settings
ARIADOWNLOADER.DOWNLOADFOLDER.NOTEXIST: Download folder does not exist, change it in the settings
ARIADOWNLOADER.NOVALIDFILES: No valid files found in the downloaded game
RAREXTRACTOR.FAILDEFPASSWD: Default archive password did not work, enter your own?
APPMODULE.PIDEXISTS: Application is already running with PID %s
ENVEDITOR.NOVARIABLE: The name of the variable must be specified
ENVEDITOR.WINEDLLOVERRIDES: WINEDLLOVERRIDES is configured in the settings
ENVEDITOR.STEAMOVERLAY: You must disable Steam Overlay before setting LD_PRELOAD
FILESWORKER.PROTON.NOTFOUND: Failed to find Proton to run. Check Internet and game settings.
FILESWORKER.NOGAME: No game executable found. Maybe you deleted it from disk?
FILESWORKER.REMOVEENV: The environment variables are specified incorrectly, look at the game settings
LOGFORM.SUBHEADER: If there are errors, you can fix them yourself or send the log to the developer for help
LOGFORM.SEND.HINT: Send the log file with the name of the game you tried to run
FFMPEG.NOTFOUND: FFmpeg not found! Install to create shortcuts with game icons

FILECHOOSER.EXE.TITLE: Select executable file
FILECHOOSER.IMG.TITLE: Select an image for the new banner
ARIA.EXITCODE.5: Download interrupted due to low speed
ARIA.EXITCODE.8: Remote server does not support resuming download
ARIA.EXITCODE.10: Block size differed from that specified in the control .aria2 file
ARIA.EXITCODE.11: File is already being downloaded by aria2
ARIA.EXITCODE.12: The same torrent is already being downloaded
ARIA.EXITCODE.16: Failed to create new file or truncate existing one
ARIA.EXITCODE.22: HTTP response header is corrupted or unexpected
ARIA.EXITCODE.26: .torrent file is corrupted or missing required information
ARIA.EXITCODE.29: Remote server could not process the request
